meanings.definition: A unit of data equal to 1,000 bits.
meanings.sent1: I downloaded a kilobit of information for my school project.
meanings.sent2: The file size was measured in kilobits, making it easy to understand.
meanings.sent3: My computer tried to eat a kilobit of data, thinking it was a tasty snack!
meanings.sent4: The kilobit of knowledge I gained was like a small seed growing in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The kilobit of data was as tiny as a grain of sand, yet held valuable information.
